verbose_text: In vitro study using rat vocal fold fibroblasts suggested that bFGF stimulates HA production and suppresses the production of collagen [XREF_BIBR] and in vivo study using a rat model of chronic vocal fold scarring showed that local injection of bFGF improved the phonatory function of scarred vocal folds [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: bFGF stimulates HA production and suppresses the production of collagen
